mapper.select: select b.ItemsInID,a.InBillID,a.TimeIn,c.ItemsName,b.Type,b.StorePosition,b.ItemNum,b.ItemPrice,b.ItemTotal,a.AllTotal,d.UserName,a.CheckStatus,b.Note from InBill as a left join ItemsIn as b on a.InBillID = b.InBillID left join Goods as c on b.GoodsID=c.GoodsID left join [User] as d on d.UserID = a.Operator

select top (#{back}- #{front}+1) * from (select a.InBillID, b.ItemsInID, a.TimeIn,c.ItemsName,b.Type,b.StorePosition,b.ItemNum,b.ItemPrice,b.ItemTotal,a.AllTotal,d.UserName,a.CheckStatus,b.Note from InBill as a left join ItemsIn as b on a.InBillID = b.InBillID left join Goods as c on b.GoodsID=c.GoodsID left join [User] as d on d.UserID = a.Operator )as show where InBillID not in ( select top (#{front}-1) InBillID from (select a.InBillID, b.ItemsInID, a.TimeIn,c.ItemsName,b.Type,b.StorePosition,b.ItemNum,b.ItemPrice,b.ItemTotal,a.AllTotal,d.UserName,a.CheckStatus,b.Note from InBill as a left join ItemsIn as b on a.InBillID = b.InBillID left join Goods as c on b.GoodsID=c.GoodsID left join [User] as d on d.UserID = a.Operator )as show )

select COUNT(*) from (select b.ItemsInID, a.InBillID,a.TimeIn,c.ItemsName,b.Type,b.StorePosition,b.ItemNum,b.ItemPrice,b.ItemTotal,a.AllTotal,d.UserName,a.CheckStatus,b.Note from InBill as a left join ItemsIn as b on a.InBillID = b.InBillID left join Goods as c on b.GoodsID=c.GoodsID left join [User] as d on d.UserID = a.Operator) as show
